name: Friday Night Funkin' vs Zoom Out
name_original: Friday Night Funkin' vs Zoom Out
description:
It's Dad Battle BUT IT KEEPS ZOOMING/FADING OUT...

Headphones are strongly recommended for the best possible experience.

P.S. This is my first original mod. I've customized the vanilla engine so that it supports custom control layouts now.  Go to the [Options] menu and let me know what you think in the comment section below.
